text: 2|62|(muham'mad nabiyil) visvasiccavarea, yahudamatam svikariccavarea, kraistavarea, sabikalea arakatte, allahuvilum antyadinattilum visvasikkukayum, salkarm'mam pravarttikkukayum ceytittullavarkk avarute raksitavinkal avar arhikkunna pratiphalamuntâ€Œ. avarkk bhayappetentatilla. avar duhkhikkenti varikayumilla
